description: Digits 1..n in strict descending order n..1 interpreted in base n+1.
comments: All odd-indexed (2n+1) terms are divisible by (2n+1). See A051847.
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..200
maple: a(n) := proc(n) local i; add(i*((n+1)^(i-1)),i=1..n); end;
crossrefs: The right edge of A051845. Cf. also A023811.
author: _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 13 1999
